alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln; Menominee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 5:51AM CST until February 22 at 9:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 15 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Langlade, Lincoln, and Menominee Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Wednesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible Wednesday night and Thursday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
